channel.title: Cache error (ReaD please) = rep
channel.description:
I have 20 online on my server although new people are coming and saying cache wont download , it says requesting title screen then connection error , i had this issue before and my coder said cache link was dead and he fixed although he left me , how can i fix this problem as the cache link is dead what do i do to upload another or anything??
Please help in detail thanks so much ill rep best answer

item.title: Cache error (ReaD please) = rep
item.dc:creator: @maxw maxw
item.description:
@maxw wrote:

old school scape i repped you thanks dude!

Wait how do i get the download link for the drop box?

Read full topic

item.title: Cache error (ReaD please) = rep
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Use FileDen man, and if you use a webclient, make a new account every 2-3 days and re-upload the cache then update the client. Free things only get you so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache error (ReaD please) = rep
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Go into ur cache folder, select all files in it, >Right Mouse< >Add to archive< (Make sure u make it .zip)

Then go on dropbox (or make an dropbox account)
Upload ur Cache.zip in the “Public folder”
And get the public download Link, Copy the link.

and open Cachedownloader.java in ur client, U will see private String cacheLink = "******************";

Change tje ****************** to ur Public Download link, Save, Compile, DONE

Read full topic

item.title: Cache error (ReaD please) = rep
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If it’s just the link that’s dead you only have to re-upload the cache to an autodownloading site.

Use a tool called dropbox, place the cache (zipped) into your public folder and then use that link.

Read full topic
